thread.title: Business trip
thread.title_full: Business trip - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: brendasB9326OU
title: Business trip
text: Overall experience very good. Staff in general are very attentive and welcoming. Breakfast service was really good. The only complain is the accesibility for transportation because there are some hours durin the evening where in front of the hotel is a lot of traffic and is difficult for UBER or taxis to get to the street where is the hotel.
